00048 void Draw::text(SDL_Surface* surface, const string text, SDL_Color color,
00049                 const int x, const int y, const int size, const int alpha) {
00050         TTF_Init();
00051         // Load font
00052         TTF_Font *font = TTF_OpenFont(Setting::FONT, size);
00053         // Set font, text and color
00054         SDL_Surface *surfaceText;
00055         if (alpha < 255) {
00056                 surfaceText = TTF_RenderText_Solid(font, text.c_str(), color);
00057         } else {
00058                 surfaceText = TTF_RenderText_Blended(font, text.c_str(), color);
00059         }
00060         // Set position
00061         SDL_Rect rectText = { x, y, 0, 0 };
00062         // Set alpha
00063         if (alpha < 255) {
00064                 SDL_SetAlpha(surfaceText, SDL_RLEACCEL | SDL_SRCALPHA, alpha);
00065         }
00066         // Set to surface
00067         SDL_BlitSurface(surfaceText, NULL, surface, &rectText);
00068         SDL_FreeSurface(surfaceText);
00069         TTF_CloseFont(font);
00070 
00071 }
